message.body: It works I tried it a few days ago
Also Alec used it last night
Anyway you could try it again just to be sure? I just want to make sure she can get it tomorrow.
She is coming tomorrow around 3:30. Will you be home?
Did you get a chance to check the lockbox? Beth just called me.
The lock box works Alec uses it every night to see me basically
No worries. I just want to be sure Beth gets in. She is doing me a Huge favor by doing this. She is in no shape to come back to work yet. I sounds like she can barely walk let alone do stairs.
Cool well I got like 4 new bites last night so hope it works out

If Beth is on the case we should be able to get rid of them once & for all. I wouldn't blame you if you were skeptical but while my confidence in Cindy is very low. But I am sure Beth will get rid of them. I don't think she has ever failed when treating for bedbugs or anything. She is tenacious. Cindy on the other hand.......
Did Beth have a bunch of questions when talked?
